title: NCollapsibleProps
description: Neuron collapsible component for expandable/collapsible content sections. Displays a title with a toggle trigger to show or hide child content.

title.description: Title text displayed in the collapsible header trigger.

defaultOpen.description: Whether the collapsible is open by default (uncontrolled mode).

open.description: Whether the collapsible is open (controlled mode).

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
